derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a lobe of the ear, liver, etc.): diminutive of lap

means.word_mean: 1. a fleshy wrinkled and often brightly colored fold of skin hanging from the neck or throat of certain birds (chickens and turkeys) or lizards
2. a small lap on a garment or headdress
3. medium-sized hairy moths; larvae are lappet caterpillars
